name: Beneath the Desk
description:
After being pulled aside by her boss, Scarlet, is given one last chance to keep their job. Another angry customer and you're FIRED!
Make sure not to shortchange the customer, and keep an eye on what's under the desk, wouldn't want it to escape.

How to Play:

Click and drag money from the register to give a customer the correct change, them give them their game card

Flick mouse down to keep watch on the creature under the desk

Survive the shift :)

Credits :

Cam : Main Programmer & Designer
Thomas Collins : Music and Story Boarding
"Cracking/Crunching, A.wav" by Inspector (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
And Me HGJake for the majority of art!
